info:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">
    $('#titlewords').remove();
    $('#titleStatus').remove();
    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    var div = $('<div style="text-align:center; width:100%;"/>');
    var p = $('<p/ id="titlewords">');
    
    $('#titleScript').parent().hide();
    div.append(p);
    toolbar.append(div);

    function displayTitle(lh) {
        p.text(lh); 
    }

    // Watch the payload and update the title
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
            displayTitle(data);
        });
    })(scope);
</script>

<style>
    #headerStatus {
        font-weight: bold;
        text-transform: uppercase;
    }

    #headerStatus.online {
        color: lime;
    }

    #headerStatus.offline {
        color: tomato;
    }

    #headerStatus.Alarm {
        color: red;
    }
    }

    #headerStatus.project {
        color: lightgray;
    }
</style>

format:
<script>
    scope.$watch('msg', function(data) {
            var elem = document.getElementById(data.topic)
            if(elem !== null) {
                if (data.hasOwnProperty('fontFamily')) {elem.style.fontFamily = data.fontFamily}
                if (data.hasOwnProperty('fontStyle')) {elem.style.fontStyle = data.fontStyle}
                if (data.hasOwnProperty('color')) {elem.style.color = data.color}
                if (data.hasOwnProperty('fontSize')) {elem.style.fontSize = data.fontSize}
                if (data.hasOwnProperty('fontWeight')) {elem.style.fontWeight = data.fontWeight}
                if (data.hasOwnProperty('payload')) {elem.innerHTML = data.payload};
                if (data.hasOwnProperty('image')) {elem.src = data.image};
                
            }
        });
    })(scope);
</script>

msg.reset = false;
return msg;

var reset = global.get("reset");
if (reset) {msg.payload = "cancel";msg.topic = "control";return msg; }

var powerfail = global.get("powerfail");
if (powerfail) {return msg;}

return msg;

global.set("vfdrestartdelay", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: Analog Notes
func:
msg.payload = "Analog Scale - Set to max value on sensor 20ma

Analog Min Scale - Value at 4ma on sensor output

Startup-Delay - Delay time until trip is activated after motor starts.

Restart Delay - Delay in minutes unitl the motor will try to restart after a trip. 0 turns off restart." return msg;

name: PID Notes
func:
msg.payload = "Invert On -The higher the PV Higher the Output. Fill Tank

" + "Invert Off -. The lower the PV Higher the Output. Empty Tank

" + "Start and Stop setpoints set to 0 disables automatic starting and stopping." return msg;

name: File Browser
info:
1) Update the default folder in the Init node
2) Update the default folder in the Reset node as well
3) You can duplicate the Reset nodes and use them as saved shortcuts
4) Check the Convert Timestamps function node if you want to see your dates in a different format. I just used the Javascript toISOString format.
5) The Graph button can read any CSV file which have any number of values, but the first column always contains a timestamp column with javascript timestamp of the data point.

name: Convert timestamps

command: sudo iwlist wlan0 scan | grep ESSID | sed 's/ESSID://g;s/"//g;s/^ *//;s/ *$//'
name: scan
parseOptions
parseInfo
func:
var ip = msg.payload.match(/inet ([0-9\.]+)/)[1]
var mask = msg.payload.match(/netmask ([0-9\.]+)/)[1]
var broadcast = msg.payload.match(/broadcast ([0-9\.]+)/)[1]


node.send({topic: 'ip', payload: ip})
node.send({topic: 'mask', payload: mask})
node.send({topic: 'broadcast', payload: broadcast})

msg.payload = {ssid: msg.payload}

return msg;

name: getPassphrase
func:
var data = msg.payload

var command = `wpa_passphrase "${data.ssid}" "${data.password}" | sed '/#psk=".*"/d'`
 
msg.payload = command

return msg

name: updateWpasupplicant
func:
var template = `sudo tee /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant-wlan0.conf <<EOF
ctrl_interface=DIR=/var/run/wpa_supplicant GROUP=netdev
update_config=1
country=US

${msg.payload}
EOF\n
`

msg.payload = template

return msg;

name: showMessage
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.trim() === 'OK' ? "Wifi configuration updated successfully" : "Error while updating wifi configuration"

return msg;

name: parseInfo
func:
var ssid = msg.payload.match(/ESSID:"([^"]+)"/)[1]


node.send({topic: 'ssid', payload: ssid})
